description.narrative:
Vietnam Association for Protection of Children's Rights (VACR) proposes the project "Improving access to justice for child victims of sexual abuse in Ha Noi" to pilot the model of communication in educating the community and to build capacity in judicialsupport for children and families who are victims of sexual abuse in Hanoi, served as the basis for nationwide replication. The project aims to strengthen the access to justice and legal assistance for children and families who are victims of sexual abusein Hanoi through 3main objectives.
Objective 1: Awareness raising for the community on the procedure of handling, gathering evidence and requestingsupport and legal assistance for child sexual abuse cases. Objective 2: Capacity building for law enforcement support groups to protect children and families who are victims of sexual abuse in Hanoi, including people's assessors; police, procurators; lawyers, jurists, legal assistants; civil society organizations, the staff of National Child ProtectionHotline 111 and lecturers on law at schools; media; care centers for children. Objective 3: Increasing the access to legal advice and support for children and families whoare victims of sexual abuse in Hanoi. This project adopts a right-based approachby(1) awareness-raising and enhancing law enforcement; (2) assist victims in accessing justice, and (3) advocate for policy change.

description.narrative: Women and Men able to: # of people (M/F) living in poverty and injustice use their enhanced knowledge and skills to fullfill their rights on freedom of association, freedom of expression and to participate in public affairs.
men living in poverty and injustice use their enhanced knowledge and skills to fullfill their rights on freedom of association, freedom of expression and to participate in public affairs.

comment.narrative: Due to pandamic covid 19 happened in Vietnam, VACR worked both offline and online with beneficiaries so more men in both rural and urban could participate/ access in the project
